pageContext.claim: We “are rebuilding our standing in the world.”
pageContext.analysis: Two international surveys indicate the United States has fallen in world standing since Trump became president. The U.S. lost its top spot as the country with the best brand image, falling from first place to sixth, in a survey released in November. And a Pew Research Survey released In June showed a dramatic drop in international approval, with citizens in 35 out of 37 countries having less confidence in Trump than they did in former President Obama.
